name: Vaccination Credential
description: A form to be used for verifiable COVID-19 vaccination certificates for basic interoperability

attr_information.vaccineType: SNOMED CT or Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical Classification System
attr_information.medicinalProductName: Union Register of medicinal products or Vaccine medicinal products not centrally organized in the EU
attr_information.marketingAuthorizationHolder: Organisation code from EMA (SPOR-system for ISO IDMP) or Vaccine Manufacturers not in OMS
